title: yaml.dll missing
body: I am currently trying to open league but i keep getting the message yaml.dll is missing but the file is there. I have tried replacing the file but it still does not work. Any solution that doesn't require me to reinstall?

replies.body: me too what should i do about it ?

There might be security settings getting in the way here that's preventing your files from being accessed.  I recommend double checking your anti-virus and running through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure league is being added as an exception.
